definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Inscribed with a dozen or more function scales, the slide rule symbolized the mysteries of arcane science.
sentences.chinese: 計算尺上刻著十幾種函數刻度，宛如科學奧祕的化身。

sentences.english: Release the Foot Switch when the Calibration Indicator reaches its set position.
sentences.chinese: 當刻度指示器指向規定的位置，放開腳踏板。

sentences.english: The measuring cup is arranged at the lower end of the barrel cover and is marked with graduations.
sentences.chinese: 量杯設置在桶蓋的下端，量杯上標有刻度。

sentences.english: In America, temperature is measured on the Fahrenheit scale.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，溫度是用華氏刻度來衡量的。

sentences.english: Partitionassays were set up in 15mL graduated centrifuge tubes.
sentences.chinese: 分配實驗在15毫升刻度離心管中進行。

sentences.english: Calibration of pressure system is the precondition of formation tester log.
sentences.chinese: 壓力系統的刻度是地層測試器測井的前提。

sentences.english: Soldering temperature scale on panel for easy control.
sentences.chinese: 焊接溫度刻度在面板上，方便控制。

sentences.english: The major scale units must be a larger time unit than the minor scale units.
sentences.chinese: 主刻度代表的時間單位必須比次刻度的大。

sentences.english: The major scale units must be a larger time unit than the minor scale units.
sentences.chinese: 主刻度代表的時間單位必須比次刻度的大。

sentences.english: The measuring cup is graduated in ounces.
sentences.chinese: 這隻量杯是盎司刻度的。

sentences.english: The baby is 10 cm taller, measured by a ruler.
sentences.chinese: 用刻度尺一量，寶寶真是又長高了10釐米。

sentences.english: Why did the blonde scale the chain-link fence?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼美女在柵欄上標上刻度？

sentences.english: Throttling index plate and mounting hardware is included.
sentences.chinese: 包括節流刻度板和安裝五金件。

sentences.english: The same applies to Morse code and the Farenheit scale.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的，莫爾斯代碼和華氏刻度也不能被收錄。

sentences.english: It is pointed out that this method can be applied to location-scale parameter families.
sentences.chinese: 本文還指出，這種方法可用於位置一刻度參數分佈族。

sentences.english: Place medication cup at eye level and fill to desired level.
sentences.chinese: 藥杯與眼同高，倒藥液至所需刻度處。

definition: pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
to measure time/to time/to reckon by time
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
